title: Chicken Caesar Salad (misbranding/undeclared allergen)
summary: WASHINGTON, Aug. 26, 2011 - Triple B Corporation, an Anchorage, Alaska establishment, is recalling approximately 229 pounds of chicken Caesar salads because of misbranding and an undeclared allergen. The chicken Caesar salads include individual packets of Caesar salad dressing made with egg, a known allergen...
impacted_products: 12-oz. plastic containers of "Signature Café GRILLED CHICKEN CAESAR SALAD," with a Use By date of 08/25/11 through 08/30/2011 located on a sticker in the top right corner of the package.
